Q_DESC: Write a C++ Program to Add Digits of Number using pointer.
TESTCASE_1:
23
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
The sum of the digits of 23 is 5
TESTCASE_2:
6474
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
The sum of the digits of 6474 is 21
TESTCASE_3:
347
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
The sum of the digits of 347 is 14
